description.english: Get off your well-toned bottom
description.french: Lever un peu ses fesses.
description.german: Beweg deinen wohlgeformten Arsch
description.italian: Muovi il tuo culo scolpito.
description.russian: Подними свою загорелую задницу
description.spanish: Levanta ese culito tan prieto.

description.english: Make a thousand pancakes
description.french: Faire un millier de crêpes.
description.german: Mach tausend Pfannkuchen
description.italian: Prepara mille pancake.
description.russian: Сделай тысячу оладушек
description.spanish: Prepara mil tortitas.

displayName.english: The second one is also free...

description.english: Be pretty
description.french: Se faire beau.
description.german: Mach eine gute Figur
description.italian: Sii carino.
description.russian: Будь миленьким
description.spanish: Sé guapo.

displayName.french: On fait un jeu sur moi

description.english: Playing with Deadpool's junk
description.french: Jouer avec les trucs de Deadpool.
description.german: Spiel mit Deadpools Kram
description.italian: Gioca con le cianfrusaglie di Deadpool.
description.russian: Поиграй с хозяйством Дедпула
description.spanish: Juega con las cosas de Masacre.

displayName.english: In the lobby comboin' your dudes
displayName.russian: В вестибюле, делаю комбо на твоих парнях

description.english: Score a combo higher than 40 before they lock the elevators
description.french: Réaliser un combo d'au moins 40 coups avant le blocage des ascenseurs.
description.german: Schaffe eine Kombo über 40, bevor sie den Aufzug sperren
description.italian: Realizza una combo superiore a 40 prima che blocchino gli ascensori.
description.russian: Выполни комбо дороже 40 очков до того, как лифты заблокируют
description.spanish: Realiza un combo superior a 40 antes de que bloqueen los ascensores.

description.english: Get from the studio lobby to the boardroom without dying in 5 minutes
description.french: Aller du salon du studio à la salle de conférence sans mourir en 5 minutes.
description.german: Gelange in 5 Minuten von der Studio-Lobby in die Chefetage, ohne dabei zu sterben
description.italian: Vai dall'ingresso dello studio alla sala riunioni senza morire in 5 minuti.
description.russian: Доберись из вестибюля студии до зала заседаний за пять минут не умерев.
description.spanish: Ve desde el vestíbulo hasta la sala de conferencias en 5 minutos sin morir.

description.english: Complete 'Job One'
description.french: Terminer 'Travail prioritaire'.
description.german: Schliess 'Auftrag Eins' ab
description.italian: Completa 'Primo incarico'.
description.russian: Выполни 'Работенку №1'
description.spanish: Completa 'Primer curro'.

description.english: Take no damage on the waterslide
description.french: Ne subir aucun dégât sur le toboggan.
description.german: Nimm auf der Wasserrutsche keinen Schaden
description.italian: Non subire danni sull'acquascivolo.
description.russian: Спустись по водяной горке без урона.
description.spanish: No sufras ningún daño en el tobogán.

displayName.french: Tu m'auras pas, tu m'auras pas

description.english: Defeat Arclight while taking no damage from her slam attacks
description.french: Battre Arclight en évitant toutes ses attaques projetées.
description.german: Besiege Arclight, ohne Schaden durch ihre Schlagangriffe zu nehmen
description.italian: Sconfiggi Arclight senza subire danni dai suoi attacchi violenti.
description.russian: Победи Арклайт не получив урона от ее пробивных атак.
description.spanish: Derrota a Arco Voltaico sin sufrir daño de sus golpetazos.

displayName.spanish: Ninguna es fea por donde mea

description.english: Use all three switches, defeat the two phasers, and chase after Vertigo within 60 seconds
description.french: Utiliser les trois interrupteurs, battre les deux Phasers et rattraper Vertigo en 60 secondes.
description.german: Betätige innerhalb von 60 Sekunden alle drei Schalter, besiege die zwei Phaser und verfolge Vertigo
description.italian: Usa tutti e tre gli interruttori, sconfiggi i due phaser e insegui Vertigo in 60 secondi.
description.russian: Активирую все три переключателя, победи двух фазеров и погонись за Вертиго за 60 секунд
description.spanish: Pulsa los tres interruptores, derrota a los dos fásicos y persigue a Vértigo en menos de 60 s.

description.english: Complete 'Taking a Chance'
description.french: Terminer 'Le moment ou jamais'.
description.german: Schliess 'Eine gute Gelegenheit' ab
description.italian: Completa 'Rischi da correre'.
description.russian: Выполни 'Идя на риск'
description.spanish: Completa 'Incursión mediática'.

description.english: Slap Wolverine a bunch of times
description.french: Frapper Wolverine plusieurs fois.
description.german: Schlag Wolverine ein paar Mal
description.italian: Prendi a schiaffi Wolverine diverse volte.
description.russian: Влепи Росомахе несколько раз.
description.spanish: Abofetea a Lobezno un montón de veces.

description.english: Shoot everything from the Wheel of Insanity (Balloons and the Cow)
description.french: Tirer sur tout dans la Roue de la démence (les ballons et la vache).
description.german: Schiess alles vom Rad des Irrsinns ab (Ballons und die Kuh)
description.italian: Spara a tutto dalla Ruota della Follia (palloncini e mucca).
description.russian: Попади во все преметы на Колесе Безумия (воздушные шары и корова)
description.spanish: Dispárale a todo desde la Rueda de la Locura (los globos y la vaca).

description.english: Play WTF is Cable
description.french: Jouer à 'Mais qui c'est, Cable ?'.
description.german: Spiele 'Wer zum Teufel ist Cable'
description.italian: Scopri 'Chi cazzo è Cable?'.
description.russian: Сыграй 'Что за хрен этот Кабель?'
description.spanish: Comprueba 'Quién es Cable'.

description.english: Kill 4 enemies in the Tower Plaza with stealth kills
description.french: Tuer 4 ennemis de manière furtive sur la place de la tour.
description.german: Erledige 4 Gegner im Tower Plaza mit Stealth-Kills
description.italian: Uccidi furtivamente 4 nemici nella piazza della torre.
description.russian: Убей четырех врагов в Тауэр Плаза используя навыки скрытности
description.spanish: Mata sigilosamente a 4 enemigos en la plaza de la torre.

description.english: Complete 'Genosha'
description.french: Terminer 'Génosha'.
description.german: Schliess 'Genosha' ab
description.italian: Completa 'Genosha'.
description.russian: Выполни 'Геноша.'
description.spanish: Completa 'Genosha'.

description.english: Get through Toxic River without falling into or touching the water and taking damage
description.french: Traverser la rivière toxique sans tomber dedans ou toucher l'eau et subir des dégâts.
description.german: Überquere den giftigen Fluss ohne das Wasser zu berühren und Schaden zu nehmen
description.italian: Supera il fiume tossico senza caderci dentro, senza toccare l'acqua e senza subire danni.
description.russian: Перейди Токсичную Реку не упав в воду и не получив урон от касаний.
description.spanish: Atraviesa el río tóxico sin caer en él ni sufrir daños por tocar el agua.

description.english: Interact with all the ladies at the Shower Surprise Party room
description.french: Interagir avec toutes les dames dans la douche surprise.
description.german: Interagiere mit allen Frauen im Partyraum
description.italian: Interagisci con tutte le signorine nella stanza del party a sorpresa.
description.russian: Поговори со всеми девушками на вечеринке-сюрпризе.
description.spanish: Tontea con todas las pibas en la fiesta sorpresa.

description.english: Heh heh, good times
description.french: Hé hé, c'était le bon temps.
description.german: Haha, gute Zeiten
description.italian: Eheheh, bei tempi.
description.russian: Ха-ха, хорошие были времена
description.spanish: Je, je, qué buenos tiempos.

description.english: Get a stealth kill with every melee weapon in Sinister's Lair without being detected
description.french: Éliminations furtives avec chaque arme de mêlée dans le repaire de Sinistre.
description.german: Erziele mit jeder Nahkampfwaffe einen Stealth-Kill in Sinisters Versteck ohne entdeckt zu werden
description.italian: Uccidi furtivamente con ogni arma da mischia nel covo di Sinistro senza farti individuare.
description.russian: Незаметно убей по одному врагу с помощью каждого оружия ближнего боя в логове Злыдня
description.spanish: Ejecuta una muerte sigilosa con cada arma cuerpo a cuerpo en la guarida de Siniestro sin ser visto.

description.english: Stealth Kill Sinister, in the Prison, with the Sword!
description.french: Tuer Sinistre de manière furtive dans la prison avec l'épée !
description.german: Erledige Sinister im Gefängnis per Stealth-Kill mit dem Schwert!
description.italian: Uccidi furtivamente Sinistro in prigione con la spada.
description.russian: Незаметно убей Злыдня, в тюрьме, мечом!
description.spanish: ¡Mata sigilosamente a Siniestro en la Prisión con la Espada!

description.english: Complete 'Landed in Prison'
description.french: Terminer 'Arrivée en prison'.
description.german: Schliess 'Im Gefängnis' ab
description.italian: Completa 'Atterraggio in prigione'.
description.russian: Выполни 'Загремел в кутузку'
description.spanish: Completa 'Aterrizaje entre rejas'.

description.english: Get a high score at the Carnival
description.french: Obtenir le meilleur score au carnaval.
description.german: Erreiche einen Highscore auf dem Jahrmarkt
description.italian: Segna un record al luna park.
description.russian: Попади в список победителей на Карнавале
description.spanish: Consigue una puntuación máxima en el parque de atracciones.

displayName.french: Je crois que c'est un coffre

description.english: Find 11 treasure chests in the darkness of the Tombs
description.french: Trouver 11 coffres à trésor dans l'obscurité des tombes.
description.german: Finde 11 Schatzkisten in der Dunkelheit der Gräber
description.italian: Trova 11 scrigni del tesoro nel buio dentro le tombe.
description.russian: Найди одиннадцать сундуков с сокровищами во тьме Гробниц.
description.spanish: Encuentra 11 cofres de tesoro en la oscuridad de las tumbas.

description.english: Beat 'Death, Baby' while wearing the pirate hat
description.french: Terminer 'La Mort, chérie' en portant le chapeau pirate.
description.german: Schliess 'Death, Baby' ab, während du den Piratenhut trägst
description.italian: Supera 'Morte, tesoro' mentre indossi il cappello da pirata.
description.russian: Отбарабань 'Смерть, Детка' надев пиратскую шляпу
description.spanish: Completa 'Cita con la muerte' llevando puesto el sombrero pirata.

displayName.spanish: La paciencia no es una virtud

description.english: Choose the patience option all the way through the line in the Carnival
description.french: Choisir uniquement de rester patient dans la file d'attente du carnaval.
description.german: Wähle auf dem Jahrmarkt die ganze Schlange hindurch die Option 'Geduld'
description.italian: Scegli di aspettare per tutta la fila al luna park.
description.russian: Выбери путь терпения стоя в очереди на Карнавале
description.spanish: Escoge la opción de paciencia durante toda la cola en el parque de atracciones.

description.english: Complete 'Death, Baby'
description.french: Terminer 'La Mort, chérie'.
description.german: Schliess 'Death, Baby' ab
description.italian: Completa 'Morte, tesoro'.
description.russian: Выполни 'Смерть, детка'
description.spanish: Completa 'Cita con la muerte'.

description.english: Collect all DP points and ammo in the bathroom
description.french: Obtenir tous les points DP et les munitions dans la salle de bains.
description.german: Sammle alle DP-Punkte und Munition auf der Toilette
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i punti DP e le munizioni del bagno.
description.russian: Собери все очки ДП и патроны в ванной.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los puntos de Masacre y la munición en el cuarto de baño.

description.english: Shoot up the copier in the bridge offices
description.french: Tirer sur la photocopieuse dans les bureaux du pont.
description.german: Schiess den Kopierer in den Brückenbüros ab
description.italian: Spara alla fotocopiatrice negli uffici del ponte.
description.russian: Выпусти обойму в ксерокс в офисном здании
description.spanish: Dispara a la fotocopiadora en las oficinas del puente.

description.english: Complete the Breach in 10 seconds
description.french: Réussir l'intrusion au ralenti en moins de 10 secondes.
description.german: Schaff den Durchbruch in 10 Sekunden
description.italian: Completa 'Irrompi!' in 10 secondi.
description.russian: Выполни проникновение за 10 секунд
description.spanish: Completa la brecha en 10 segundos.

description.english: Complete 'The Road to Victory'
description.french: Terminer 'La voie de la victoire'.
description.german: Schliess 'Die Strasse zum Sieg' ab
description.italian: Completa 'La strada per la vittoria'.
description.russian: Выполни 'Дорогу к Победе'
description.spanish: Completa 'El camino a la victoria'.

description.english: Make it across the floating debris without falling
description.french: Traverser les débris volants sans tomber.
description.german: Gelange ohne Sturz über die schwebenden Trümmer
description.italian: Supera i detriti fluttuanti senza cadere.
description.russian: Переберись через плавающие обломки не упав
description.spanish: Pasa sobre los restos flotantes sin caer.

description.english: Complete 'Front Gates of EEEEEEEVIL!' from start to finish without dying
description.french: Terminer 'Les portes du MAAAAAL !' sans jamais mourir une seule fois.
description.german: Schliess 'Portal des BÖÖÖÖÖÖÖSEN!' vom Anfang bis zum Ende ab, ohne zu sterben
description.italian: Completa 'Le porte del MALEEE!' dall'inizio alla fine senza morire.
description.russian: Заверши 'Главные Врата ЗЛАААААА' от начала до конца не умерев.
description.spanish: Completa 'La puerta del MAL' desde el principio hasta el final sin morir.

description.english: Score a combo of 75 or more while fighting up the stairs at the 'Front Gates of EEEEEEEVIL!'
description.french: Réaliser un combo d'au moins 75 coups en montant l'escalier dans 'Les portes du MAAAAAL !'
description.german: Kämpf dich in 'Portal des BÖÖÖÖÖÖÖSEN!' mit einer Kombo von 75 oder mehr Treffern die Stufen hinauf
description.italian: Realizza una combo da 75 o più mentre combatti sulle scale di 'Le porte del MALEEE!'.
description.russian: Заработай 75 или больше очков за комбо, пробиваясь на лестнице в миссии 'Главные Врата ЗЛАААААА'
description.spanish: Consigue un combo de 75 o más luchando en las escaleras de 'La puerta del MAL'.

description.english: Die 10 times in a row through the floating stairs
description.french: Mourir 10 fois d'affilée dans les escaliers flottants.
description.german: Stirb 10-mal hintereinander auf der Schwebetreppe
description.italian: Muori 10 volte di fila sulle scale fluttuanti.
description.russian: Умри десять раз подряд на плавающей лестнице
description.spanish: Muere 10 veces seguidas en las escaleras flotantes.

description.english: Complete 'Front Gates of EEEEEEEVIL!'
description.french: Terminer 'Les portes du MAAAAAL !'
description.german: Schliess 'Portal des BÖÖÖÖÖÖÖSEN!' ab
description.italian: Completa 'Le porte del MALEEE!'.
description.russian: Заверши 'Главные Врата ЗЛАААААА'.
description.spanish: Completa 'La puerta del MAL'.

description.english: Complete 'Front Gates of EEEEEEEVIL!' from start to finish using only swords and pistols
description.french: Terminer 'Les portes du MAAAAAL !' en n'utilisant que les épées et les pistolets.
description.german: Schliess 'Portal des BÖÖÖÖÖÖÖSEN!' von Anfang bis Ende ab und verwende nur Schwerter und Pistolen
description.italian: Completa 'Le porte del MALEEE!' dall'inizio alla fine usando solo spade e pistole.
description.russian: Заверши 'Главные Врата ЗЛАААААА' от начала до конца используя только мечи и пистолеты.
description.spanish: Completa 'La puerta del MAL' usando solo espadas y pistolas de principio a fin.

displayName.spanish: Si no hay Masacre, no hay locura

description.english: Complete the game on Veteran difficulty
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode Vétéran.
description.german: Schliess das Spiel auf der Schwierigkeitsstufe 'Veteran' ab
description.italian: Completa il gioco al livello Veterano.
description.russian: Заверши игру на уровне сложности Бывалый
description.spanish: Completa el juego en dificultad Veterano.

displayName.german: Kennst du DP, kennst du Irrsinn
displayName.spanish: Conoce a Masacre, y la locura

description.english: Complete the game on Ultra-Violence! difficulty
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode Ultra-violence !
description.german: Schliess das Spiel auf der Schwierigkeitsstufe 'Ultra-Brutal!' ab
description.italian: Completa il gioco al livello Ultraviolenza.
description.russian: Заверши игру на уровне сложности Ультра Насилие!
description.spanish: Completa el juego en dificultad ¡Ultraviolencia!

displayName.english: So you've got some free time?
displayName.russian: Ну что, у тебя есть свободное время?
displayName.spanish: Vamos, que te sobra el tiempo

description.english: Complete 'Landed in Prison' without countering any attacks
description.french: Terminer 'Arrivée en prison' sans avoir contré une seule attaque.
description.german: Schliess 'Im Gefängnis' ab, ohne einen einzigen Angriff zu kontern
description.italian: Completa 'Atterraggio in prigione' senza contrattaccare.
description.russian: Выполни 'Загремел в кутузку' не отражая ни одной атаки
description.spanish: Completa 'Aterrizaje entre rejas' sin lanzar ningún contraataque.

description.english: In 'Genosha' reach the Fan Girl using only Hammers and Plasma Rifles
description.french: Dans "Génosha", rejoindre la fangirl en n'utilisant que les marteaux et les fusils à impulsion.
description.german: Erreiche auf "Genosha" das Fangirl nur mit Hämmern und Pulsgewehren
description.italian: In "Genosha", raggiungi la fan usando solo martelli e fucili a impulsi.
description.russian: Проходя 'Геношу', доберись до фанатки используя только кувалды и лазерные винтовки
description.spanish: En ''Genosha'', llega hasta la admiradora usando solo martillos y fusiles de impulso.

displayName.german: Nur wenn er nicht mehr atmet

description.english: Set the Dialog Volume slider to zero
description.french: Mettre la barre du volume des voix sur zéro.
description.german: Setze den Sprachausgaberegler auf Null
description.italian: Imposta il volume dei dialoghi a zero.
description.russian: Уменьши громкость диалога до нуля
description.spanish: Baja al cero el volumen de los diálogos.

description.english: Collect 100 tacos
description.french: Obtenir 100 tacos.
description.german: Sammle 100 Tacos
description.italian: Raccogli 100 tacos.
description.russian: Собери 100 тако
description.spanish: Recoge 100 tacos.

description.english: Purchase all Player Upgrades
description.french: Acheter toutes les améliorations du personnage.
description.german: Kaufe alle Spielerverbesserungen
description.italian: Acquista tutti i potenziamenti giocatore.
description.russian: Приобрети все улучшения игрока
description.spanish: Compra todas las mejoras de jugador.

description.english: Complete five Gold Challenges
description.french: Terminer cinq défis or.
description.german: Schliess fünf Gold-Herausforderungen ab
description.italian: Completa cinque sfide oro.
description.russian: Выполни все пять золотых задания
description.spanish: Completa cinco desafíos de oro.

description.english: Complete a Gold- or Silver-tier Challenge while countering at least 25 times
description.french: Terminer un défi or ou argent en ayant contré au moins 25 fois.
description.german: Schliess eine Gold- oder Silber-Herausforderung ab und kontere dabei mindestens 25-mal
description.italian: Completa una sfida oro o argento contrattaccando almeno 25 volte.
description.russian: Выполни одно из золотых или серебрянных отразив не меньше 25 раз.
description.spanish: Completa un desafío de oro o plata realizando al menos 25 contraataques.

description.english: Combo an entire wave on any Gold-tier Challenge map
description.french: Terminer toute une vague en un seul combo dans n'importe quel défi or.
description.german: Kombo über eine komplette Welle auf einer beliebigen Gold-Herausforderungskarte
description.italian: Sbaraglia un'intera ondata con una combo in una mappa di sfide oro.
description.russian: Пройди целую волну в одно комбо на любом из золотых заданий
description.spanish: Realiza un combo contra toda una oleada en cualquier mapa de un desafío de oro.

displayName.english: Pull the grenade, throw the pin
displayName.italian: Lancia la sicura, la granata no

description.english: Kill a total of 15 enemies by holding cooked grenades
description.french: Tuer 15 ennemis en ayant attendu le dernier moment pour lancer sa grenade.
description.german: Erledige insgesamt 15 Gegner, indem du scharfe Granaten hältst
description.italian: Uccidi 15 nemici tenendo in mano una granata attivata.
description.russian: Убей в сумме 15 врагов держа активированные гранаты.
description.spanish: Mata a un total de 15 enemigos sosteniendo granadas cebadas en la mano.

description.english: Upgrade all weapons to max
description.french: Améliorer toutes les armes au maximum.
description.german: Verbessere alle Waffen auf Maximum
description.italian: Potenzia al massimo tutte le armi.
description.russian: Прокачай все оружия по максимуму
description.spanish: Mejora todas las armas al máximo.

description.english: Bank a 300-hit combo
description.french: Décrocher un combo de 300 coups.
description.german: Lege eine 300-Treffer-Kombo hin
description.italian: Realizza una combo da 300 colpi.
description.russian: Выполни комбо на 300 очков
description.spanish: Realiza un combo de 300 golpes.
